backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature that updates a specific MissionSection image to use a new asset via assetPath.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for key frontend files used in the marketing site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, favicon, root container, and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling header, hero, mission, roadmap, token, footer, and toaster components.
frontend/src/components/zen/Footer.tsx: Footer with logo, quick navigation buttons, community links, and dynamic year handling.
frontend/src/components/zen/HeaderNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
Hero section with headline, CTAs, energy-source stats, and a gradient background.
frontend/src/components/zen/MissionSecti: Mission section with title, description, feature cards, and an updated mascot image using assetPath.
frontend/src/components/zen/RoadmapSecti: Displays a multi-phase roadmap using cards and lists generated from a phases array.
frontend/src/components/zen/TokenSection: Shows the ZEN token contract address with copy functionality, token info, and a link to Pump.fun.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity loading behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for query logic on the static marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color palette using CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/assetPath.ts: Builds asset URLs using the deployment base path to ensure correct loading on subpaths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, query client, and identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks the projectâ€™s schema version, current state, feature list, known issues, and architectural notes. Represents build context and required site features for the ZEN website.
